trans-unit.source: Represents a composition during the text input events of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma composição durante os eventos de entrada de texto de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is a FrameworkTextComposition when the user enters text into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> by using an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>, or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é um FrameworkTextComposition quando o utilizador introduzir texto para uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>utilizando um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] e <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: FrameworkTextComposition is the base class of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.
trans-unit.target: FrameworkTextComposition é a classe base da <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition> class defines properties that return <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> objects to indicate the position of the text composition.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>classe define as propriedades que devolvem <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>objetos para indicar a posição da composição de texto.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>

trans-unit.source: When the user enters text into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador introduzir texto para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox> <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: Finalizes the composition.
trans-unit.target: Finalizes a composição.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the current composition in Unicode symbols.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o comprimento de composição atual no símbolos de Unicode.

trans-unit.source: The CompositionLength property indicates how many characters have been entered since the last <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade CompositionLength indica quantos carateres tem sido introduzidos desde o último <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: This property is only meaningful when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é só tem significado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs, CompositionLength is –1, and the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> property indicates the length of the composition.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>evento ocorrer, CompositionLength –1 e o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A>propriedade indica o comprimento da composição.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: CompositionLength is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: CompositionLength é apresentado no .NET Framework versão 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [versões e dependências](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The length of the current composition in Unicode symbols.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento de composição atual no símbolos de Unicode.

trans-unit.source: Gets the position at which the composition text occurs in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a posição em que o texto de composição ocorre a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is only meaningful when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é só tem significado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> is –1, and the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> property indicates the position of the composition text.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>evento ocorre, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A>é –1 e o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A>propriedade indica a posição do texto de composição.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: CompositionOffset is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: CompositionOffset é apresentado no .NET Framework versão 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [versões e dependências](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The position at which the composition text occurs in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A posição em que o texto de composição ocorre a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the finalized text in Unicode symbols when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o comprimento do texto finalizado em Unicode símbolos quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs, ResultLength is –1.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>evento ocorrer, ResultLength –1.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: ResultLength is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: ResultLength é apresentado no .NET Framework versão 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [versões e dependências](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The length of the finalized text in Unicode symbols when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento do texto finalizado em Unicode símbolos quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: Gets the offset of the finalized text when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o deslocamento do texto finalizado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> is –1.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>evento ocorre, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A>é –1.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: ResultOffset is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: ResultOffset é apresentado no .NET Framework versão 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [versões e dependências](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The offset of the finalized text when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento do texto finalizado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>
